name: Roadie
text:
Roadie
An unidentified roadie was in a band with Rusty Tomasky.
Biography
On their way to Knife River, the van driven by the roadie and his band lost a tire near Twin Peaks, Washington. The roadie witnessed Rusty follow Windom Earle into the woods.
After Rusty's body was discovered, the roadie told Dale Cooper about Rusty and the events leading up to his disappearance.
